text: Algophagidae is a family of mites in the order Astigmata. There are about 5 genera and at least 10 described species in Algophagidae. ==Genera== These five genera belong to the family Algophagidae: * Algophagus Hughes, 1955 * Fusohericia Vitzthum, 1931 * Hericia Canestrini, 1888 * Neohyadesia Hughes & Goodman, 1969 * Terraphagus Clark, 2012 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * Category:Acari
title: Algophagidae
